turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Imperial Japanese Navy.

turn.6: The Japanese were also able to get some concessions, most notably the battleship , which had been partly funded by donations from schoolchildren and would have been scrapped under the terms of the treaty.

turn.8: And the non-fortification of naval bases in the Western Pacific.
